## Importing datasets to R
```{r}
Base=c()
for (yr in 2000:2007) {
##Final Matrix  
m <- read.csv(paste("1-Intermediate_Processed_Data//final_matrix_", yr, ".csv", sep=""), header = TRUE, sep = ",", dec = ".")

m$year=yr
m <- m %>% select(year, everything())

Base=rbind(Base, m)

}
```


# General Instructions
The purpose of this task is to calculate region-sector level deficits. The deficit for a region $i$ in a sector $k$ would be defined as: 
$$
D_{i,k}=\sum_j X_{ij,k} - \sum_j X_{ji,k}
$$
```{r}
for (yr in 2000:2007) {
  final_matrix=c()
  for (k in 101:114) {
    matrix <- Base %>%
      filter(year==yr, sector==k) %>%
      select(-importer, -sector, -year)
    tot_exp=colSums(matrix)
    tot_imp=rowSums(matrix)
    deficit=tot_exp-tot_imp
    final=data.frame(deficit)
    final$sector=k
    final$year=yr
    final$region=Base$importer[1:87]
    final <- final %>% select(year, region, sector, deficit)
    final_matrix=rbind(final_matrix, final)
  }
write.table(final_matrix, file = paste("1-Intermediate_Processed_Data//deficits_", yr, ".csv", sep=""), sep = ",", row.names = FALSE)
}

```
